education.title: The University of Manchester
education.sub: MSc Advanced Computer Science: Artificial Intelligence
education.text: The course lasts twelve(12) months of academic year, the first six months of which the following modules were covered: Foundations of Machine Leearning, Data Modelling, Unsupervised Learning, Data Querying, Text Mining/NLP, and Computer Vision, and the other 6 months are for the competion of a full MSc Project with a written Dissertation.

education.title: Multimedia University, Cyberjaya
education.text: This was when I was exposed to the beauty and excitement of software programming. We covered various topics including Software Design, Web Development, Algorithm Design and Analysis, Artificial Intelligence, Databases, Computer Networks and Security.

education.title: INTEC (International Education Center)
education.grade: Results: Biology: E  Chemistry: D  Mathematics: B
education.text: This was the point in my life that I actually failed and stumbled. I believe that great people fail, but what makes them great is the fact that they did not stay defeated, but they stay persistent to their goals and dreams, got back up, and try harder/smarter. Walt Disney, Stephen King, Bill Gates, JK Rowling are examples of personalities that failed before succeeding.

education.title: Sekolah Menengah Kebangsaan Taman S.E.A.
education.sub: Sijil Pelajaran Malaysia (Malaysia Certificate of Education) - equivalent to the O-Levels
education.text: My High School days. Worked very hard to achieve the results.
